Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Just some random colorful (and not-so much) space doodlings. Not really related to Kerbal Space Program too much i guess...

Comments, critisisms, and insults all welcome. :[]

Edited May 15, 2014 by Daemoria

This reminds me like myself. I always think of things, big colony ships, ksp mods, but never do em.

Your drawings look great!
ah the beloved homeworld styled art. gotta love this!
I decided to put a bit more time/effort into a sketch. This was the result.
This art... is epic. And looks like it's underrated.

I really like the style of your creations in general.

Now get back to SRI *whipcrack*

Edited May 16, 2014 by Cpt. Kipard

Hey Daemoria, what kind of magical software do you use to produce such amazing depictions of your imagination?

Now get back to SRI *whipcrack*

Thanks for existing.

Sorry, I don't have the time to really dedicate myself to multiple projects at the moment, so I had to put the lock-down on the SRI mod. I do want to continue it at a later point in time when I have an abundance of free time tho.

In the mean time, have some Pirates!!!

"I see the Flickerbeams shining, so bright and harsh."

- Red-haven gunnery officer.

Edited May 30, 2014 by Daemoria
You have a talent for art work these are very nice, you should make posters with these! very nice work Daemoria!
Very nice work here. Both your 2D and 3D art! Remind me a lot of EVE Online, were you inspired by that?
I get more a Homeworld vibe. Mostly because the art style is much like the Homeworld concept art.

Nooo, Daemoria, get back to work on SRI! We need your awesome parts in-game!

Just kidding, carry on. Hope everything goes well with your new job!

It looks awesome but I'm suspicious that it could be just recolored art by other artists for some reason.

Could I see a work in progress?

Sorry, I don't have the time to really dedicate myself to multiple projects at the moment, so I had to put the lock-down on the SRI mod. I do want to continue it at a later point in time when I have an abundance of free time tho.

In the mean time, have some Pirates!!!

http://i.imgur.com/y1z1kQ5.png

"I see the Flickerbeams shining, so bright and harsh."

- Red-haven gunnery officer.

Strike suit zero much? (from the trailing blue lines (also in homeworld) and the shape of the ships. it's like a mix of cowboy bepop, homeworld and strike suit zero.
These are absolutely awesome pieces of work. I may have to steal borrow some ideas for my own drawings

@Blue. Seriously? Where have you seen these designs before? Check my slumbering SRI thread [link in signature image] for other examples of my work.

But if you insist, you can do an image search for 'Daemoria'. I hope that would put your fears to rest, but if that doesnt....have a WIP image or two or three.

Well, my hand just about fell off. Gotta take a break from the tablet.

Work in progress on my Battleship/Carrier hybrid for the 3D Squirrel contest. Come join in the fun, if you want to do some 3d modeling.

http://www.3dsquirrel.co.uk/forums/forum/45-battleships/
Wow these are much better than the silly pieces of polygons i do in sketch up!
The tech in that setting must be very advanced.
Nice to see you're still keeping the jaws droppin' Daemoria.
What program do you use?

@NASAFanboy

I start with an idea either in photoshop/paper/napkin or rough mesh file in Cinema4d.

I then refine the mesh to where the proportions look good from all angles, and then take it back to photoshop.

Then it's time for lots and lots of work with the standard hard round brush with tablet sensitivity disabled.

Wow these are much better than the silly pieces of polygons i do in sketch up!

Same here...*Sniff*
So basically, you take an idea, model it, texture it, and add detail to it in Photoshop? Goddamn... I need to step up my game by about a factor of a thousand!

I love it all. Maybe on near future we can have this type of ship design parts from all this drawings.

The warm hole are cool.

And Daemonia, you have the taste.

Edited June 5, 2014 by Climberfx
